TopDown.MainPrompt: a bird's eye, top-down of the subject, to be seamless integrated into a virtual battlemap
TopDown.NegativePrompt: facing the viewer, looking up, partial body, cut off, background elements, scenery, landscape, environment details

Token.MainPrompt: a close-up of the main features of the subject, with a solid neutral background, to be used as a token on a virtual battlemap
Token.NegativePrompt: partial head, cut off, background elements, scenery, landscape, environment details

Portrait.MainPrompt: a portrait of the subject, displaying the full view of the subject, with an interesting background, to be used as a display of the subject
Portrait.NegativePrompt: cropped parts, distorted features, incorrect anatomy or perspective
